channel.title: NetBeans Screencasts and Video Demos
channel.description: Screencasts that show you all the cool features of NetBeans, the free and open-source IDE for Java development and scripting.

item.title: Getting Started with Cordova in NetBeans IDE
item.description: This screencast demonstrates how to create applications that use HTML, JavaScript, and CSS, and then deploy them as native Android or iOS applications via Cordova.

item.title: JDK 8 Support in NetBeans IDE
item.description: This screencast demonstrates how to set up NetBeans IDE 7.4 to use JDK 8, together with how to use JDK 8 profile support and lambda expressions.
